name: Leopard Berry Batik Headwrap
description:
This Leopard Batik Berry Wrap is a Double layer Wrap of Leopard Print overlayed with a beautiful print of Cream Flowers and Burnt Sienna Berries, and features a Ruched Bloom in a Variegated Deep Burnt Oange to Sienna Batiked Polka Dot Print, and framed with linen leaves in Golden Brown~

A beautiful piece to add a pop of rich color to your Fall and Winter Wardrobe!

Because this Wrap TIES on- it is super comfortable, no metal tips to dig in, and fits Children to Adults! Which also makes it the Perfect fit whether you have long or short, thick or thin hair.
Great to wear for~
Going out
To Work
To School
To a party
While exercizing- running, cycling, yoga, zumba, and more! Keeps your hair out of your face, and keeps you looking stylish at the same time!
Also great if you have hair loss- chemotherapy or alopaecia, or to add to your scarf if you wear a headcovering!

Ways to Wear:
* Wear it under your hair, and across the top like a regular headband. {If you have hair that likes to make things slip and slide, the closer you wear it to your hair line, the more secure it will be.}
* Wear it around your head Bohemian style
*Tie it around a hat band
*Even wrap it several times around your wrist and tie it for a GREAT Bracelet Wrap!! :)

***2nd image is for styling and size reference only, and is not the Wrap you will receive.

Like this style? Click Here to see more! http://www.etsy.com/shop/ThePurpleChameleon?section_id=10456317

name: StacheWrap Tie on Headband 5 Colors
description:
At last!  A Wrap for all you Stache Fans!

Super Fun Headwrap with Multi Color Staches in 5 color Options, and 2 pattern directions- you can choose to have the Staches go either side to side short width {{see Blue close up}, or lengthwise from one end to the other {{see Black close up}}

Because this Wrap TIES on- it is super comfortable, no metal tips to dig in, and fits Children to Adults! Which also makes it the Perfect fit whether you have long or short, thick or thin hair.

Ways to Wear:
* Wear it under your hair, and across the top like a regular headband. {If you have hair that likes to make things slip and slide, the closer you wear it to your hair line, the more secure it will be.}
* Wear it around your head Bohemian style
*Tie it around a hat band
*Even wrap it several times around your wrist and tie it for a GREAT Bracelet Wrap!! :)



**Please see Shop Announcement for Current Turnaround Times

{{{How do YOU Get Spotted}}}
